list.expr: sum(ALERTS{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", alertstate="firing", alertname=~"ticdc.*"}) by (alertname) > BOOL 0
list.name: All TiCDC alerts

panels.description: Uptime of TiCDC and TiKV
panels.title: Uptime

panels.title: CPU usage

panels.description: Memory usage of TiCDC
panels.title: Memory usage

panels.description: The lag between changefeed checkpoint ts and the latest ts of upstream TiDB.
panels.title: Changefeed checkpoint lag

panels.description: The lag between changefeed resolved ts and the latest ts of upstream TiDB.
panels.title: Changefeed resolved ts lag

panels.description:
The status of each changefeed.

0: Normal

1: Error

2: Failed

3: Stopped

4: Finished

-1: Unknown
panels.title: The status of changefeeds

panels.description: The number of errors that interrupt changefeed per minute
panels.title: Exit error count/m

panels.description:
The number of events that puller outputs to sorter 
 per second

targets.expr: sum (rate(ticdc_puller_txn_collect_event_count{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", changefeed=~"$changefeed", instance=~"$ticdc_instance"}[1m])) by (namespace,changefeed, instance, type)

panels.title: Puller output events/s

panels.description: The total number of events that puller outputs

targets.expr: sum(ticdc_puller_txn_collect_event_count{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", changefeed=~"$changefeed", instance=~"$ticdc_instance"}) by (namespace,changefeed, instance, type)

panels.title: Puller output events

panels.description:
The number of events that sorter outputs to puller 
 per second

targets.expr: sum(rate(ticdc_sorter_output_event_count{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", changefeed=~"$changefeed", instance=~"$ticdc_instance"}[1m])) by (namespace,changefeed, instance, type)

panels.title: Sorter output events/s

panels.description: The total number of events that sorter outputs

targets.expr: sum(ticdc_sorter_output_event_count{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", changefeed=~"$changefeed", instance=~"$ticdc_instance"}) by (instance,namespace, changefeed, type)

panels.title: Sorter output events

panels.description: The number of events that mounter outputs to sink per second
panels.title: Mounter output events/s

panels.description: The total number of events that mounter outputs

targets.expr: sum(ticdc_mounter_total_rows_count{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", changefeed=~"$changefeed", instance=~"$ticdc_instance"}) by (namespace,changefeed, instance)

panels.title: Mounter output events

panels.description: The number of rows that sink flushes to downstream per second.

targets.expr: sum(rate(ticdc_sink_batch_row_count_sum{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", changefeed=~"$changefeed", instance=~"$ticdc_instance"}[1m])) by (namespace,changefeed, instance)

panels.title: Sink flush rows/s

panels.description: The number of rows(events) that are flushed by sink.
panels.title: Sink flush rows

panels.description: Sink worker busy ratio
panels.title: Backend Flush Duration

panels.description: Full flush (backend flush + callback + conflict detector notify) duration
panels.title: Full Flush Duration

panels.description: MQ worker send messages to Kafka, this metric record the time cost on send every message.
panels.title: Worker Send Message Duration Percentile

panels.description:
Bytes/second written off all brokers.
value = one-minute moving average rate of Bytes per second

targets.expr: sum(ticdc_sink_kafka_producer_outgoing_byte_rate{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", changefeed=~"$changefeed", instance=~"$ticdc_instance"}) by (namespace,changefeed, instance, broker)

panels.title: Kafka Outgoing Bytes

targets.expr: sum(ticdc_sink_cloud_storage_file_count{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", changefeed=~"$changefeed"}) by (namespace, changefeed, instance)

panels.description: The total count of rows that are processed by redo writer
panels.title: Redo Write rows/s
